description.value:
Not all deities, and very few demigods, grant their followers a choice of more than one Domain, but you've unlocked an alternate Domain that worshipers of specific sects can choose. Choose a Domain you don't currently grant your followers. Your Clerics can select that Domain as their subclass choice, and you gain the @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-ancestries-demigods.feat-dnd5e.Item.qN3vFOyznPSHesEs]{Delve Into Domain} feat for that Domain.

Repeatable. You can take this divine boon more than once, but you must choose a different Domain each time.

system.requirements: Level 8+, Renown 19+, Delve Into Domain feat
